title: 14 Day Suspension
body: Just wondering if there's a way to view the specific chat logs that banned me as their example was rather lack lustre, only had like one or two negative things out of the 20 or so chat lines. I haven't received an email or not sure if I should, can understand the suspension it's just there example was of a much more mild case of what I've entered in chat from the past.

replies.body:
Hi Haarry!

The chatlog that gets presented to you should be what trigger your suspension. I've taken a look at the logs myself and unless there was some mistake with what is being presented to you, I would not consider any of what you said "lack lustre".

If you are concerned there was a mistake, feel free to share the log you were presented here for review.
I got a 14-day suspension for saying one phrase loool. Riot is too harsh on some players

> [{quoted}](name=Khangaroo,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=A7KAfnE3,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-04T11:36:09.781+0000)
>
> I got a 14-day suspension for saying one phrase loool. Riot is too harsh on some players

Na, iv been playing since the beta and they have had to progress into this way because of our community. They are spot on IMO. Hostility does nothing for the game.

From the Hint above I believe you said more than one phrase.  If in doubt a good rule is 'Don't be a Dick'.

Might work.
it only takes saying "f g t" or "kys" once to get suspended/banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Lebron Games,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=A7KAfnE3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-10-04T07:48:07.577+0000)
>
> it only takes saying "f g t" or "kys" once to get suspended/banned.

WHAT SERIOUSLY! 

Do you have proof/evidence?

yes

1. these forums is full of people posting their chat logs. there's many cases where its obvious that they got suspended/banned because of the one line containing a word like that. furthermore, volunteers and riot employees have confirmed it in some cases.

2. i received a 2 week suspension on a fresh lvl 3 account when literally the only thing i said in it was "piss off f g t". had not used chat at all until then. no prior punishments. no chat restrictions, just instant  2 week suspension. you can assume that it's literally possible to get perm banned for saying it once in 2 separate games. 

pretty ridiculous if you think about it especially considering they have the ability to restrict your chat. meanwhile it takes A LOT more than 2 games for someone who trolls and intentionally ruins games to get punished, if they even do.
